manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: R+Co Conditioners Thin, Fine Hair Hair Type Color treated Thickens+Strengthens Benefit: Tones + Vibrancy Medium Moisture: Medium Light Weight: Medium Thin, Fine Hair Hair Type All Thickens+Strengthens Benefit: Body + Shine Medium Moisture: Medium-High Light Weight: Light Thin, Fine Hair Hair Type Dry hair Thickens+Strengthens Benefit: Hydration + Shine Medium Moisture: High Light Weight: Medium Thin, Fine Hair Hair Type Curly hair Thickens+Strengthens Benefit: Tames + Shine Medium Moisture: High Light Weight: Medium-High

Complete the Look RODEO STAR Thickening Foam For big, beautiful, bouncy hair. This thickening shampoo adds vitality to fine, flat hair while nourishing and strengthening from root to tip. DALLAS Thickening Shampoo This thickening shampoo adds vitality to fine, flat hair while nourishing and strengthening from root to tip. DALLAS Thickening Spray Quintessential spray for a mega blow-dry. Great for volume at roots, control at ends and an overall smooth look. Tons of body and shine w/o stiffness. DEATH VALLEY Dry Shampoo The quickest way to get volume and body into your hair. This dry shampoo absorbs extra oil and adds texture for an untamed look.

Product Point of Difference Ingredient conscious formulas with outstanding performance + killer fragrances Our award-winning line of products feature unique ingredients and benefits designed to deliver immediate, high-performing results while keeping hair and scalp health at top-of-mind. All our formulas are color-safe, heat and UV protective, vegan, cruelty and gluten-free, and without harmful ingredients such as parabens, sulfates (SLS or SLES), mineral oil and petrolatum. Good Hair That's Good For the Earth R+Eco/Sustainability We are amping up our commitment to reduce our footprint on earth with the introduction of post-consumer resource (PCR) packaging. We are focused not only on good hair, but also what is good for the planet! Look for the R+Eco logo as we take our commitment one step further by transitioning all R+Co bottles to 55% PCR material. PCR packaging is gathered from domestic US sources AND reduces virgin plastic consumption + decreases the use of fossil fuels and energy used in package manufacturing. 100% Vegan, Gluten + Cruelty-free R+Co Is Leaping-Bunny Certified A well-known certification, Leaping Bunny recognizes brands free of animal testing. ALL YOU NEED IS GOOD HAIR Top hairdressers collaborating on an award-winning product line From new talents to legendary superstars, we consult with those whose skills and influences differ from our own. Whether we work with someone to develop a new product or invite them to speak at one of our happenings, we keep the diversity and range of our collective shifting to reflect an ever-changing world. Perfect playlists for work + play R+Co Talk Radio Listen to our collection of curated sounds by The Collective, beauty + music influencers and other special guests!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This and the Dallas shampoo together are fabulous. Great scent. Really plumps up the hair and feels lush. Very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Goodbye "bad hair" days!
reviews.reviewText: After losing my hair to chemo and radiation which I happily did because I am now a cancer survivor, I was left with hair that was both curly and straight and hard to do much with. My stylist recommended the shampoo and conditioner to me and after just a few uses, I saw my hair normalizing. Instead of having random curly areas, I found my hair was becoming more consistently straight so I could dry it in a chin length style( shorter in back, longer on the sides) and not have one side and half of the back curl up while the rest just hung. It also makes my hair much more manageable without being too soft and overconditioned ( read, oily looking).I highly recommend this product and will look into their other ones because of my experience with their shampoo and conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and doesn’t weigh hair down
reviews.reviewText: The bottles are nice packaging, a little goes a long way, and the smell is pleasant. As far as it thickening my hair or promoting hair growth, I cannot attest to that as it’s only been used twice. I will update as I use it more. I will say it does not wear my hair down like many hair conditioners and I’ll like it so far. I did buy this with the shampoo by the same brand with the biotin. I can tell a difference in the volume and shininess of my hair after several uses. I will buy both again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, smells strong.
reviews.reviewText: Sadly, I really dislike the smell. It has a very 'manly' scent. It does work great though! It leaves my hair light, full, and manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s expensive, but it works
reviews.reviewText: It is expensive, but it lasts a long time. You only need a very small amount and it works well I do recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a very reputable company with stellar products. I haven't used their products except when in a salon, rather, using a different salon product. I decided to switch to this company and product, being so very pleased I did! My hair is shiny and clean for more than 1 day, very manageable and so soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Much smaller than it looks
reviews.reviewText: 8oz is much smaller than I expected. I love the scent and packaging, and I think your hair falls out less after using this because it does a great job of smoothing and detangling, but I will be purchasing another conditioner that is better value for money going forward. It is just sooo small and a bit disappointing because it goes so fast. It is also a thick conditioner, so it is hard to get out after a couple uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great root boost
reviews.reviewText: I have very thin hair so it’s hard to get a good lift. This product gives my hair extra fullness.
